name: Es ist Zeit
description:
"We stand and embrace at the window, they watch us from the street:
it is time, for this to be known!
It is time that the stone took the trouble to bloom,
that unrest’s heart started to beat.
It’s time for it to be time.

It is time."
-Corona by Paul Celan

A portrait of our dialogue through time and space, through places and coincidence coming from an uncertain time

A portrait of a union with no beginning nor end

A portrait of you and me forming a shared gaze

- from an uncertain time
